name: expense-tracker-pro
description: A modern, minimal expense tracking web application with advanced features for managing personal finances

scripts.copy:assets: mkdir -p dist/assets && cp -r assets/* dist/assets/ 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.copy:all: npm run copy:html && npm run copy:css && npm run copy:js && npm run copy:assets
scripts.minify:js: terser js/app.js js/storage.js js/charts.js js/export.js -o dist/bundle.min.js -c -m
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run copy:all
scripts.build:prod: npm run clean && npm run minify:css && npm run minify:js && npm run copy:html && npm run copy:js

author: Kriss
